channel.title: Connecting to server
channel.description: Okay i have tryed this with many clients. I know for a fact that it is notthe servers fault cause i can log into it with a different client that was not made for the server. Okay, so i am using dannyscapes client and server and also yourserver/yourclient and i set the gui server ip to 0.0.0.0, ran the server and try to log in and it just stays at connecting to server and does not log in. Help would be very appreciated

item.title: Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

you cant log into your own server withyour ip you gotta use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @chase_scape chase scape
item.description:
@chase_scape wrote:

[quote=“alex809, post:4, topic:380837”]re downlaod the yourserver because i got it to run just fine.

download it and DO NOT CHANGE THE IP leave as is.

compile and run again do not do anything unless you need to change the jdk version then right click on the compiler and the run and the play now and change that.[/quote]Why would i leave it as 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 because then people wont be able to log onto the server. I want to use this client

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @alex809 alex809
item.description:
@alex809 wrote:

re downlaod the yourserver because i got it to run just fine.

download it and DO NOT CHANGE THE IP leave as is.

compile and run again do not do anything unless you need to change the jdk version then right click on the compiler and the run and the play now and change that.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server

item.description:
@chase_scape wrote:

Okay i have tryed this with many clients. I know for a fact that it is notthe servers fault cause i can log into it with a different client that was not made for the server. Okay, so i am using dannyscapes client and server and also yourserver/yourclient and i set the gui server ip to 0.0.0.0, ran the server and try to log in and it just stays at connecting to server and does not log in. Help would be very appreciated
